metadata.title: CVE-2022-0996 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in the 389 Directory Server that allows expiredpasswords to access the database to cause improper authentication.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
